official_title: To direct the Secretary of Energy to establish labeling requirements for products that emit low-frequency electromagnetic fields.

summary.text: Electromagnetic Labeling Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of Energy to establish uniform labeling requirements meeting specified criteria for products that emit low-frequency electric and magnetic fields of specified strengths. Authorizes the Secretary to impose a civil penalty against a manufacturer of such products for labeling violations under this Act.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Energy to establish labeling requirements for products that emit low-frequency electromagnetic fields.
